text: The Changan UNI-T is a compact crossover produced by Changan Automobile. ==History== Changan UNI-T rear Changan showed a first glimpse of the UNI-T at the Shanghai Auto Show in April 2017 with the concept vehicle Yuyue Concept. The production model was to be presented at the Geneva Motor Show in March 2020. However, the show was canceled on 28 February 2020 because of the COVID-19 pandemic, which is why Changan finally presented the Uni-T in China at the end of March 2020. The model came on the Chinese market in June 2020. == Technical data == At the market launch, the UNI-T is powered by a supercharged 1.5-liter petrol engine with . A stronger two-liter gasoline engine should follow later, according to the manufacturer. ==References== ==External links== UNI-T Category:Compact sport utility vehicles Category:Crossover sport utility vehicles Category:Cars introduced in 2020 Category:2020s cars
title: Changan UNI-T
